::DarkMouse::

She was still arguing with Inferno. "Look, I'm not going back there 
unless I know for sure that I'm not getting slagged. I know for a 
fact that....I.." The breeze came up and she caught the scent of 
other bots near by.  She sniffed the air and coud tell that the scent 
didn't belong to a Predacon.  She looked at inferno, She motioned 
with her hands that there were other bots near them and to run for 
it.   She smiled politely. "Look, It's been fun Inferno, but I'm not 
out to serve anyone unless I know that I'm going to make it.  
megatron, Hell Beast, KitKat, all of then have tried to have me 
killed at one point in time. So, sorry, but this mouse is out of 
here."  then took off in a dear run away from Inferno and the scent 
of the other bots. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He came up, through the ground, a few feet away from Inferno, behind
> cover. He opened a link to StarScream.
> "Star, I've arrived. I'm behind some cover. You give the word, lets 
slag
> these turkeys."
